name: Amber Seal: Lightning Ward
description: A small chunk of carved otherworldly amber.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, granting protection against lightning.

use_action.msg: You conjure a lightning ward spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Angelic Seal: Ward Against Evil
description: An small winged figurine, carved from a strange iridescent stone.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, granting protection against various anomalous effects.

use_action.msg: You conjure a protective spell.

name: Bone Seal: Agility
description: A small set of dice carved from otherworldly bones.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, granting a temporary agility effect.

use_action.msg: You conjure an agility spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Chitinous Seal: Confuse Monsters
description: A small token carved from a wicked stinger.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, confusing monsters all around you.

use_action.msg: You conjure a spell of confusion.

name: Dagger Seal: Might
description: A miniature dagger carved from strange ivory.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, granting a temporary boost to strength.

use_action.msg: You conjure a spell of might.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Eternity Seal: Clairvoyance
description: A small cabochon of dark, shimmering ivory.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, granting a temporary clairvoyance effect.

use_action.msg: You conjure a clairvoyance spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Indigo Seal: Free Action
description: A small ornament of vibrant purple petals.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, granting protection against paralytic effects and other hindrances.

use_action.msg: You conjure a protective spell.

name: Obsidian Seal: Invisibility
description: A piece of unnaturally dark stone, shaped into an eccentric design.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, granting a temporary invisibility effect.

use_action.msg: You conjure an invisibility spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Scarlet Seal: Overgrowth
description: A small ornament of woven petals, an otherworldly vibrant red in hue.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, and bring forth the forest.

use_action.msg: You conjure a spell of overgrowth.

name: Starstone Seal: Flame Armor
description: A shimmering disc carved from a seemingly meteoric material.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, gaining temporary resistance to heat and smoke.  Direct contact with flame will still harm you

use_action.msg: You conjure a protective spell.

name: Tear Seal: Insight
description: A curiously-refractive gem carved from an unearthly blue orb.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, granting a temporary boost to perception and your ability to scout out the surrounding area.

use_action.msg: You conjure an insight spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Thorn Seal: Clarity of Blood
description: A sharp needle carved from a monstrous thorn.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, granting protection against parasites and the Mycus.

use_action.msg: You conjure a protective spell.

name: Thunder Seal: Shockstorm
description: A small sliver of strange crystal, flickering as though distant storms rage within.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, conjuring lightning all around you.

use_action.msg: You conjure a lightning spell.

name: Woven Seal: Healing
description: A tangled knot of flowing, molded bone.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, and heal the body slightly.

use_action.msg: You conjure a healing spell.

name: Wyrm Seal: Acid Spray
description: A carved scale of acrid-smelling, otherworldly flesh.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, conjuring a spray of acid.

use_action.msg: You conjure an acid spray spell.

name: Magic Sign: Acid Armor
description: A mote of energy that smells faintly of lye.  Activate it to gain temporary resistance to corrosive effects.  Direct contact with acid will still harm you.

use_action.msg: You activate the acid armor spell.

name: Magic Sign: Acid Armor (active)
description: A mote of energy that smells faintly of lye.

use_action.activation_message: Your body becomes hardened against lingering corrosion.

name: Magic Sign: Acid Spray
description: A mote of energy with a strange, acrid scent.  Activate it to conjure a spray of acid.

use_action.msg: You activate the acid spray spell.

name: Magic Sign: Acid Spray (active)
description: A mote of energy with a strange, acrid scent.

name: Magic Sign: Agility
description: A mote of energy that seems to twitch and shiver.  Activate it to grant a temporary agility effect.

use_action.msg: You activate the agility spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Agility (active)
description: A mote of energy that seems to twitch and shiver.

name: Magic Sign: Clairvoyance
description: A mote of energy that gives you the faint feeling of being watched.  Activate it to grant a temporary clairvoyance effect.

use_action.msg: You activate the clairvoyance spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Clairvoyance (active)
description: A mote of energy that gives you the faint feeling of being watched.

name: Magic Sign: Clarity of Blood
description: A mote of energy that pulses like an arrhythmic heartbeat.  Activate it to gain protection against parasites and the Mycus.

use_action.msg: You activate the protective spell.

name: Magic Sign: Clarity of Blood (active)
description: A mote of energy that pulses like an arrhythmic heartbeat.

use_action.activation_message: Your feel an otherworldly sensation course through your veins.

name: Magic Sign: Confuse Monsters
description: A mote of energy, seemingly abuzz with whispered voices.  Activate it to confuse monsters all around you.

use_action.msg: You activate the confusion spell.

name: Magic Sign: Confuse Monsters (active)
description: A mote of energy, seemingly abuzz with whispered voices.

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Lightning
description: A mote of energy abuzz with raw power.  Activate it to conjure a field of electric death from the sign itself.

use_action.msg: You activate the lightning field spell.  Throw it!

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Lightning (active)
description: A mote of energy abuzz with raw power.
//: Gains a little weight due to throwing mechanics being weird.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You can't dispel the effect.  Might want to try throwing it instead.

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Smoke
description: A mote of energy, giving off the smell of charred flesh.  Activate it to conjure a cloud of thick, choking smoke from the sign itself.

use_action.msg: You activate the smokescreen spell.  Throw it!

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Smoke (active)
description: A mote of energy, giving off the smell of charred flesh.
//: Gains a little weight due to throwing mechanics being weird.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You can't dispel the effect.  Might want to try throwing it instead.

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Toxic Cloud
description: A mote of energy that gives off a strange miasma.  Activate it to conjure a cloud of choking, toxic gas from the sign itself.

use_action.msg: You activate the toxic cloud spell.  Throw it!

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Toxic Cloud (active)
description: A mote of energy that gives off a strange miasma.
//: Gains a little weight due to throwing mechanics being weird.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You can't dispel the effect.  Might want to try throwing it instead.

name: Magic Sign: Daylight
description: A mote of energy with a distinct shine to it.  Activate it to brighten the skies.

use_action.msg: You activate the daylight spell.

name: Magic Sign: Daylight (active)
description: A mote of energy with a distinct shine to it.

name: Magic Sign: Drain Life
description: A mote of energy with a strange aura of hunger.  Activate it to grant a temporary life-draining effect.

use_action.msg: You activate the life-draining spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Drain Life (active)
description: A mote of energy with a strange aura of hunger.

name: Magic Sign: Fireball
description: A mote of energy that seems to radiate an unearthly heat.  Activate it to conjure a wicked flame.

use_action.msg: You activate the fireball spell.

name: Magic Sign: Fireball (active)
description: A mote of energy that seems to radiate an unearthly heat.

name: Magic Sign: Flame Armor
description: A mote of energy that seems cool to the touch.  Activate it to gain temporary resistance to heat and smoke.  Direct contact with flame will still harm you.

use_action.msg: You activate the flame armor spell.

name: Magic Sign: Flame Armor (active)
description: A mote of energy that seems cool to the touch.

use_action.activation_message: Your body becomes innured to heat and choking smoke.

name: Magic Sign: Free Action
description: A mote of energy, shifting and pulsing with your heartbeat.  Activate it to gain protection against paralytic effects and other hindrances.

use_action.msg: You activate the protective spell.

name: Magic Sign: Free Action (active)
description: A mote of energy, shifting and pulsing with your heartbeat.

use_action.activation_message: You feel an otherworldly tension in your muscles, as your body becomes warded against paralytic effects.

name: Magic Sign: Healing
description: A mote of energy that seems almost alive, shifting and shimmering when near living beings.  Activate it to heal the body slightly.

use_action.msg: You activate the healing spell.

name: Magic Sign: Healing (active)
description: A mote of energy that seems almost alive, shifting and shimmering when near living beings.

name: Magic Sign: Insight
description: A mote of energy, refracting the light in curious ways.  Activate it to grant a temporary boost to perception and your ability to scout out the surrounding area.

use_action.msg: You activate the insight spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Insight (active)
description: A mote of energy, refracting the light in curious ways.

name: Magic Sign: Invisibility
description: A mote of energy, faintly transparent.  Activate it to grant a temporary invisibility effect.

use_action.msg: You activate the invisibility spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Invisibility (active)
description: A mote of energy, faintly transparent.

name: Magic Sign: Light
description: A mote of energy with a faint radiance to it.  Activate it to grant a temporary aura of illumination.

use_action.msg: You activate the light spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Light (active)
description: A mote of energy with a faint radiance to it.

name: Magic Sign: Lightning Ward
description: A mote of energy, seeming to tingle with static electricity.  Activate it to grant temporary protection against lightning.

use_action.msg: You activate the lightning ward spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Lightning Ward (active)
description: A mote of energy, seeming to tingle with static electricity.

name: Magic Sign: Might
description: A mote of energy, resonating with an unearthly force.  Activate it to grant a temporary boost to strength.

use_action.msg: You activate the spell of might.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Might (active)
description: A mote of energy, resonating with an unearthly force.

name: Magic Sign: Mind Ward
description: A mote of energy that flickers and shifts according to your thoughts.  Activate it to grant temporary protection against the evil eye.

use_action.msg: You activate the mind ward spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Mind Ward (active)
description: A mote of energy that flickers and shifts according to your thoughts.

name: Magic Sign: Open Lock
description: A mote of energy that gives off a strange aura of artiface.  Activate it to manipulate most kinds of lock.

use_action.msg: You activate the opening spell.

name: Magic Sign: Open Lock (active)
description: A mote of energy that gives off a strange aura of artiface.

name: Magic Sign: Overgrowth
description: A mote of energy that radiates unferrered life energy.  Activate it to bring forth the forest.

use_action.msg: You activate the overgrowth spell.

name: Magic Sign: Overgrowth (active)
description: A mote of energy that radiates unferrered life energy.

name: Magic Sign: Pacify Monsters
description: A mote of energy that gives off a soothing aura.  Activate it to calm the minds of nearby monsters, turning them friendly.

use_action.msg: You activate the pacification spell.

name: Magic Sign: Pacify Monsters (active)
description: A mote of energy that gives off a soothing aura.

name: Magic Sign: Poison Armor
description: A mote of energy, with a soothing aura.  Activate it to gain temporary resistance to toxic gas and other poisons.

use_action.msg: You activate the poison armor spell.

name: Magic Sign: Poison Armor (active)
description: A mote of energy, with a soothing aura.

use_action.activation_message: Your body becomes guarded against poison gas and venom's sting.

name: Magic Sign: Shockstorm
description: A mote of energy, crackling with electric death.  Activate it to conjure lightning all around you.

use_action.msg: You activate the lightning spell.

name: Magic Sign: Shockstorm (active)
description: A mote of energy, crackling with electric death.

name: Magic Sign: Summon Homunculus
description: A mote of energy with a leering face perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon a mimicry of the human form.

use_action.msg: You activate the summoning spell.

name: Magic Sign: Summon Homunculus (active)
description: A mote of energy with a leering face perceived inside it.

use_action.friendly_msg: The humanoid construct is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the humanoid construct!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Horrifying Thing
description: A mote of energy with a writhing abomination perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon a horrifying mass of tendrils.

use_action.msg: You activate the summoning spell.

name: Magic Sign: Summon Horrifying Thing (active)
description: A mote of energy with a writhing abomination perceived inside it.

use_action.friendly_msg: The mass of tendrils is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the mass of tendrils!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Skeletal Dog
description: A mote of energy with shifting canine shapes perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon an undead hound.

use_action.msg: You activate the summoning spell.

name: Magic Sign: Summon Skeletal Dog (active)
description: A mote of energy with shifting canine shapes perceived inside it.

use_action.friendly_msg: The animalistic revenant is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control to animalistic revenant!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Skeleton
description: A mote of energy with imagery of the dead perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon the animated dead.

use_action.msg: You activate the summoning spell.

name: Magic Sign: Summon Skeleton (active)
description: A mote of energy with imagery of the dead perceived inside it.

use_action.friendly_msg: The humanoid revenant is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control to humanoid revenant!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Vortex
description: A mote of energy with swirling shapes perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon the living wind.

use_action.msg: You activate the summoning spell.

name: Magic Sign: Summon Vortex (active)
description: A mote of energy with swirling shapes perceived inside it.

use_action.friendly_msg: The swirling wisp is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the swirling wisp!

name: Magic Sign: Teleport
description: A mote of energy surrounded by slight distorsions in the air.  Activate it to teleport to a random location.  Beware the risk of teleporting right into a wall.

use_action.msg: You activate the teleportation spell.

name: Magic Sign: Teleport (active)
description: A mote of energy surrounded by slight distorsions in the air.

name: Magic Sign: Wave of Destruction
description: A mote of energy that gives off a hateful aura, yearning to destroy your enemies.  Activate it to conjure a wave of pure destructive energy.

use_action.msg: You activate the destructive spell.

name: Magic Sign: Wave of Destruction (active)
description: A mote of energy that gives off a hateful aura, yearning to destroy your enemies.

name: Magic Sign: Ward Against Evil
description: A mote of energy that radiates with a soothing aura.  Activate it to gain protection from various anomalous effects.

use_action.msg: You activate the warding spell.

name: Magic Sign: Ward Against Evil (active)
description: A mote of energy that radiates with a soothing aura.

use_action.activation_message: A powerful surge of protective magic envelops your body.
